name: Jenga
howToPlay: The towerf must be built properly before starting.
Players will play one by one in turns.
Remove one block carefully and place it on the top.
rules: Do not shake or hit the table.
Remove only one block per turn.
If the tower falls during your turn, you lose.

name: Ping Pong
howToPlay: Players stand on opposite sides of the table.
rules: Match will be played up to 11 points.
Ball must bounce once on each side during serve.
Touching the table or net intentionally is a foul.

name: Paper Cutting
howToPlay: Each participant will receive one sheet of paper.
Theme/design will be announced before start.
rules: No pre-cut or extra paper allowed.
Judging will be based on neatness and creativity.
Late submissions will not be accepted.

name: Memory Card
howToPlay: Cards will be placed face down.
Players will take turns flipping two cards.
rules: If cards match, player gets another turn.
If not, cards must be placed back in same position.

name: Push-ups
rules: Only correct form will be counted.

name: Arm Wrestling
howToPlay: Elbows must stay on the table.
rules: First to pin opponentâ€™s hand wins.

name: Tongue Twister
howToPlay: Participant must repeat given tongue twister 3 times continuously.
